cerebralcortex.core.log_manager package¶

Submodules¶

cerebralcortex.core.log_manager.log_handler module¶

class cerebralcortex.core.log_manager.log_handler.LogHandler[source]¶

Bases: object

log(error_message: str = '', error_type=(1, ))[source]¶

Log errors and warnings in log file and print on console of debug is set to True

Parameters:
  • error_message (str) – error message
  • error_type (LogTypes) – error type (e.g., warning, critical etc.)
logsyslog(loglevel: str, message: str)[source]¶

Initialize logging :param loglevel: log level (e.g., warning, critical etc.) :type loglevel: str :param message: log message :type message: str
